verses.verse: We Should Fear <WG5399> Therefore <WG3767> Lest Perhaps <WG3379> Being Left <WG2641> A Promise <WG1860> To Enter <WG1525> Into <WG1519> <WG3588> <WG2663> His Rest, <WG846> Might Seem <WG1380> Any <WG5100> Of <WG1537> You <WG5216> To Come Short. <WG5302>

<WG2532> For Indeed <WG1063> We Have Had <WG2070> Glad Tidings Announced To Us <WG2097> Even As <WG2509> Also They; <WG2548> ' But <WG235> Not <WG3756> Did Profit <WG5623> The <WG3588> Word <WG3056> Of The <WG3588> Report <WG189> Them, <WG1565> Not <WG3361> Having Been Mixed With <WG4786> <WG3588> Faith <WG4102> In Those Who <WG3588> Heard. <WG191>

<WG1525> For We Enter <WG1063> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Rest, <WG2663> Who <WG3588> Believed; <WG4100> As <WG2531> He Has Said, <WG2046> So <WG5613> I Swore <WG3660> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG3709> My Wrath, <WG3450> If <WG1487> They Shall Enter <WG1525> Into <WG1519> <WG3588> <WG2663> My Rest; <WG3450> Though Verily <WG2543> The <WG3588> Works <WG2041> From The <WG575> Foundation <WG2602> Of The World <WG2889> Were Done. <WG1096>

<WG2046> For He Has Said <WG1063> Somewhere <WG4225> Concerning <WG4012> The <WG3588> Seventh Day <WG1442> Thus, <WG3779> And <WG2532> Rested <WG2664> <WG3588> God <WG2316> On <WG1722> The <WG3588> Day <WG2250> <WG3588> Seventh <WG1442> From <WG575> All <WG3956> <WG3588> <WG2041> His Works : <WG846>
And <WG2532> In <WG1722> This Place <WG5129> Again <WG3825> If <WG1487> They Shall Enter <WG1525> Into <WG1519> <WG3588> <WG2663> My Rest. <WG3450>

Since <WG1893> Therefore <WG3767> It Remains For <WG620> Some <WG5100> To Enter <WG1525> Into <WG1519> It, <WG846> And <WG2532> Those Who <WG3588> Formerly <WG4386> Heard Glad Tidings <WG2097> <WG3756> Did Not Enter In <WG1525> ' On Account Of <WG1223> Disobedience, <WG543>

Again <WG3825> A Certain <WG5100> He Determines <WG3724> Day, <WG2250> Today <WG4594> In <WG1722> David <WG1138> Saying, <WG3004> After <WG3326> So Long <WG5118> A Time, <WG5550> According As <WG2531>, It Hass Been Said, <WG2046> Today <WG4594> If <WG1437> <WG3588> Voice <WG5456> His <WG846> Ye Will Hear, <WG191> <WG3361> Harden Not <WG4645> <WG3588> <WG2588> Your Hearts. <WG5216>

<WG1487> For If <WG1063> Them <WG846> Jesus <WG2424> Gave Rest, <WG2664> <WG3756> Not <WG302> Concerning <WG4012> Another <WG243> Would He Have Spoken <WG2980> <WG3326> Afterwards <WG5023> Day. <WG2250>
Then <WG686> Remains <WG620> A Sabbatism <WG4520> To The <WG3588> People <WG2992> <WG3588> Of God. <WG2316>

<WG3588> For He That <WG1063> Entered <WG1525> Into <WG1519> <WG3588> <WG2663> His Rest, <WG846> Also <WG2532> He <WG846> Rested <WG2664> From <WG575> <WG3588> <WG2041> His Works, <WG846> As <WG5618> From <WG575> Own <WG3588> His <WG2398> <WG3588> God Did . <WG2316>

We Should Be Diligent <WG4704> Therefore <WG3767> To Enter <WG1525> Into <WG1519> That <WG1565> <WG3588> Rest, <WG2663> <WG2443> Lest <WG3361> After <WG1722> The <WG3588> Same <WG846> Anyone <WG5100> Example <WG5262> May Fell <WG4098> <WG3588> Of Disobedience. <WG543>

<WG2198> For Living Is <WG1063> The <WG3588> Word <WG3056> <WG3588> Of God <WG2316> And <WG2532> Efficient, <WG1756> And <WG2532> Sharper <WG5114> Than <WG5228> Every <WG3956> Sword <WG3162> Two Edged, <WG1366> Even <WG2532> Penetrating <WG1338> To The <WG891> Division <WG3311> Of Soul <WG5590> Both <WG5037> And <WG2532> Spirit, <WG4151> Of Joints <WG719> Both <WG5037> And <WG2532> Marrows, <WG3452> And Is <WG2532> A Discerner <WG2924> Of The Thoughts <WG1761> And <WG2532> Intents <WG1771> Of The Heart. <WG2588>

And <WG2532> <WG3756> There Is Not <WG2076> A Created Thing <WG2937> Unapparent <WG852> Before <WG1799> Him; <WG846> <WG3956> But All Things Are <WG1161> Naked <WG1131> And <WG2532> Laid Bare <WG5136> To The <WG3588> Eyes <WG3788> Of Him, <WG846> With <WG4314> Whom Is <WG3739> Our <WG2254> <WG3588> Account. <WG3056>

<WG2192> Having Therefore <WG3767> A High Priest <WG749> Great Who <WG3173> Has Passed Through <WG1330> The <WG3588> Heavens, <WG3772> Jesus <WG2424> The <WG3588> Son <WG5207> <WG3588> Of God, <WG2316> We Should Hold Fast <WG2902> The <WG3588> Confession. <WG3671>

<WG3756> For Not <WG1063> Have We <WG2192> A High Priest <WG749> Not <WG3361> Able <WG1410> To Sympathise <WG4834> <WG3588> <WG769> With Our Infirmities <WG2257> <WG3987> But Who Has Been Tempted <WG1161> In <WG2596> All Things <WG3956> ' <WG2596> According To Our Likeness, <WG3665> Apart From <WG5565> Sin. <WG266>

We Should Come <WG4334> Therefore <WG3767> With <WG3326> Boldness <WG3954> To The <WG3588> Throne <WG2362> <WG3588> Of Grace <WG5485> That <WG2443> We May Receive <WG2983>, Mercy, <WG1656> And <WG2532> Grace <WG5485> May Find <WG2147> For <WG1519> Opportune <WG2121> Help. <WG996>
